text:
Pt is a 71yo M, pmh: cirrhosis, portal htn, portal gastropathy,
   ascites, CAD s/p MI with PTCA and CABG, Chronic systolic heart failure,
   EF 36%, ulcerative colitis, recurrent cholangitis, GERD, lyme disease,
   hyperchol, htn, raynaud's dx with finger and toe amps, OSA, esophageal
   stricture, depression and ADHD.
   Gastrointestinal bleed, other (GI Bleed, GIB)
   Assessment:
   Several episodes of hemoptysis on floor.  Denied nauseau, abd pain.
   Also denied any cardiac related symptoms and no lightheadedness or
   dizziness.  Diarrhea which is hem neg.
   Action:
   Octreotide bolus, octreotide gtt, protonix bolus (on floor), protonix
   gtt,  2 U FFP, 2U prbc
s.  EGD performed with 3 varices banded.  3 new
   PIV
s placed.  Pneumoboots.
   Response:
   Hct 27.4.  No further hemoptysis or bleeding since arrival.
   Plan:
   Serial hcts, assess for S & S of bleeding, protonix and octreotide
   gtts.
   Peritonitis, spontaneous bacterial (SBP)
   Assessment:
   Diagnosed [**1-5**] and placed on cipro and increased dose due to recent
   bleed.  Has been on aztreonam (now dc
d), fluconazole with WBC cont to
   elevate despite.  Tapped on [**1-10**] and found to have GNR and started on
   meropenum and vanco.  Has abd discomfort but no new findings to suggest
   abd process.  Does have inguinal hernia which causes pt moderate pain
   with activity.
   Action:
   Abx as ordered.  Abd assessments.  Inguinial hernia support strap in
   place.
   Response:
   Cont to assess.
   Plan:
   Plan to retap when appropriate, cont abx as ordered.  Trend wbc and
   temp trends.  Cont to assess changes in abd status.
   .H/O altered mental status (not Delirium)
   Assessment:
   Action:
   Response:
   Plan:
